title: Implement User Authentication
description: Create login and signup functionality with JWT tokens. Include password hashing, session management, and OAuth integration.

title: Design Dashboard UI
description: Create responsive dashboard with charts, metrics cards, and data visualization components using React and TailwindCSS.

title: Setup CI/CD Pipeline
description: Configure GitHub Actions for automated testing, building, and deployment to production environment.

title: Write Integration Tests
description: Create comprehensive integration tests for API endpoints, database operations, and third-party integrations.

title: Optimize Database Queries
description: Analyze and optimize slow database queries, add proper indexes, and implement caching strategies.

title: Create Mobile Responsive Views
description: Ensure all pages are mobile-friendly with proper breakpoints and touch interactions.

title: Setup Monitoring and Alerts
description: Configure application monitoring, error tracking, and alerting system using tools like Sentry and Datadog.

title: Perform Security Audit
description: Conduct security testing including penetration testing, vulnerability scanning, and code review.

title: Implement Real-time Notifications
description: Add WebSocket support for real-time notifications and live updates across the application.

title: Build Analytics Dashboard
description: Create analytics dashboard with user behavior tracking, conversion metrics, and custom reports.
